bug.author: leezu
bug.summary: MXNet website often down with "Error 503 Backend unavailable, connection timeout"
bug.description:
<denchmark-code>Error 503 Backend unavailable, connection timeout
Backend unavailable, connection timeout Guru Mediation:
Details: cache-pao17420-PAO 1582943298 879971478
Varnish cache server </denchmark-code>
Happened for the second time (at least) this week. Who operates the webserver?

comments.comment:
Apache Infra team operates the server. If it still happens frequently, this is where we can report the problem. On our side, there is very little we can do about it.
https://issues.apache.org/jira/projects/INFRA/issues/INFRA-20453?filter=allopenissues.
